item.title: CVE-2023-3043|2024-08-02T06:41:04.196Z -- ami -- megarac_spx
item.description: AMIâ€™s SPx contains a vulnerability in the BMC where an Attacker may cause a stack-based buffer overflow via an adjacent network. A successful exploitation of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality, integrity, and/or availability.
